Posts.Content: Jan 6, 2014 02:22PM andrea14 wrote: Hi, I am new here but I am also starting my first chemo on Wednesday the 6th. Same feelings as everyone else here: scared, wondering how I am going to feel, etc. I am not so worried about my hair and haven't decided what to do with it yet (wig, hats, ...) It is all so scary, I can't even sleep at night. Hugs to all. Andrea
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo January 6, 2014 desimone birdlover23

Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2014 02:10PM andrea14 wrote: Hi everyone. I had my first treatment on Wednesday the 8th. So far so good. No nausea or any other symptom except constipation. It is better now. I have a question, did anyone had their period start during treatment? Looks like I am starting mine even though is not really time. Not sure if I should be concerned about it or not. Thanks
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo January 6, 2014 desimone birdlover23
